stem: All of the following organisms cause invasive diarrhea EXCEPT
disc:
Diarrhea is classified into 3 categories.
1. Non-inflammatory
2. Inflammatory
3. Invasive

For instance, Vibrio cholera causes non-inflammatory diarrhea by releasing enterotoxins.

Shigella, yersinia, and campylobacter are invasive organisms.
tags: Infective Diarrhea, Blood and Mucus Diarrhea
